title: Confirmed: Primož Roglič Abandons Tour de France After Stage 12 Crash
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe confirms Slovenian GC hopeful will not start stage 13 after heavy crash and time losses on Thursday.

Read the full article at Confirmed: Primož Roglič Abandons Tour de France After Stage 12 Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
